cards.title: We hire differently
cards.text: Most companies operate under the premise that employees should be replaceable like parts of an assembly line. We choose our people more carefully.
cards.author: Marta Fernandes

cards.title: Human Truths #5
cards.text: Humans are unique. Do you love Portugueses Pop Music (Pimba)? Do you prefer your desk covered with sunflowers? There’s no need to hide it. Be yourself. That’s how you’ll fit in here.
cards.author: João Almeida
